structure.unit: ARTICLE II. BULK SALES OF PLANTS, AVOCADOS, LIMES AND MANGOES

text.section:
Sec. 8A-55. Exemptions from article provisions.
This article shall not apply:
To the transaction of said fruit or plants by the grower prior to sale; or
To avocados and limes after inspection by the Florida State Department of Agriculture when accompanied by a certificate of inspection; or
To the transportation of said fruit or plants by license wholesale produce or nursery dealers; or
To said fruit or plants purchased outside Miami-Dade County, Florida; or
To the transportation of said fruit or plants between two (2) locations at which the transporter or his employer maintain a place of business; or
To persons growing said fruit or plants for personal consumption and not for the purposes of sale; or
To retail sales of said fruit or plants.
